title: This Week's Top Stories - Texas Storm Fallout, GOP Pushes Voter Restrictions & Surprise Kittens
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Texas Storm Fallout, GOP Pushes Voter Restrictions & Surprise Kittens
description:
Storm-ravaged Texans receive astronomical electricity bills, Republicans blatantly try to make it harder for people to vote, and a bomb scare turns out to be a box of purring kittens.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
